mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SLTR_LC_KEYWORD (OBJ_ID, USER_OBJ_ID, PROD_KEYWORD, SRC_MKT_ID, KEYWORD_URL, SEARCH_KEYWORD, SUBJECT_KEYWORD, SUBJECT_LOC_TYPE, HASH_TAG, AUTO_SEARCH_YN, COLLECT_START_PAGE, COLLECT_END_PAGE, BASE_MGN_RATE, BASE_MGN_VALUE, REGIST_DATE, COLLECT_PROD_YN, LAST_COLLECT_DATE, PROD_QTY, COLLECT_QTY, CP_CATEGORY, SS_CATEGORY, E11ST_CATEGORY, GM_CATEGORY, INTPK_CATEGORY, FAV_KEYWARD_YN, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER_ID) VALUES(#{OBJ_ID}, #{USER_OBJ_ID}, #{PROD_KEYWORD}, #{SRC_MKT_ID}, #{KEYWORD_URL}, #{SEARCH_KEYWORD}, #{SUBJECT_KEYWORD}, #{SUBJECT_LOC_TYPE}, #{HASH_TAG}, #{AUTO_SEARCH_YN}, #{COLLECT_START_PAGE}, #{COLLECT_END_PAGE}, #{BASE_MGN_RATE}, #{BASE_MGN_VALUE}, #{REGIST_DATE}, #{COLLECT_PROD_YN}, #{LAST_COLLECT_DATE}, #{PROD_QTY}, #{COLLECT_QTY}, #{CP_CATEGORY}, #{SS_CATEGORY}, #{E11ST_CATEGORY}, #{GM_CATEGORY}, #{INTPK_CATEGORY}, #{FAV_KEYWARD_YN}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{CREATE_USER_ID}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{UPDATE_USER_ID});
